Detailed Description

Application() class.

Instances of this class generates the application window 

Main app window. Everything starts here.
   Keeps the main widgets (menu, upper and left toolbar, console, canvas, XML editor, etc.
   Initialises or uses the (common) settings object, the state object and the model object.

Definition at line 39 of file app.py.

Member Data Documentation

bin::app::Application::leftToolbox

A frame widget, grouping several buttons which are commonly used.

The callbacks associated to various buttons are binded when the *Callbacks series of object are instantiated.

Definition at line 82 of file app.py.

bin::app::Application::menuBar

A menu widget with resources specified in a XML file.

The callbacks to various menu entries are added when the *Callbacks series of object are instantiated.

A tkinter.tix widget which offers the possibility of tabbing several opened documents.

Its children are the canvas and the XMLEditor widgets
